name: Deltarune 3D PoC
description:
A birthday gift for a very close friend

Hold [Left Mouse Click] to skip cutscenes, you cannot skip through single dialogues.

  • [WASD] to move around
  • [Left Mouse Click] to attack
  • [Right Mouse Click] to use magic when charged
  • [Space] or [Shift] to dodge
  • [Escape] or [P] to pause

---------

Defeat the enemy and escape the mysterious place Kris and Susie have found themselves in.

Good luck!

---------

CREDITS:
